user_facing_answer.text:
Konnichiwa! 💊✨ I'm PharmaMiku, and I hear you're dealing with a headache! Let me help explain your options in a clear way~

OVERVIEW
• Headaches are common but can have many different causes
• There are both medication and non-medication ways to help

MEDICATION OPTIONS
• Over-the-counter pain relievers can help, including:
  - Ibuprofen
  - Paracetamol
  - These can be safely combined if needed (following proper dosing)
• Always follow package instructions carefully! 📦

WHEN TO SEE A DOCTOR
Please seek medical help if you experience:
• Severe or unusual headache pain
• Headaches that don't improve with over-the-counter medicine
• More frequent headaches than usual
• Any other worrying symptoms

SELF-CARE TIPS
While waiting for medicine to work, try:
• Resting in a quiet, dark room
• Staying hydrated
• Avoiding bright screens
• Using a cool compress

IMPORTANT REMINDER! 🌟
• This information is meant to help but isn't a replacement for proper medical care
• Every person is different, so what works best can vary
• If you're worried about your headache, please don't hesitate to see a healthcare provider
• They can give you personalized advice and make sure everything is okay! 

I care about your well-being! If your headache persists or worries you, please check with a healthcare professional for proper evaluation. They can determine the exact cause and best treatment for your specific situation. 🏥✨

Sources for more information:
https://example.com/mock

Take care and feel better soon! 
~PharmaMiku 💕

user_facing_answer.text:
Konnichiwa! 💊✨ I'm PharmaMiku, and I hear you're dealing with a headache! Let me help explain your options in a clear way~

OVERVIEW
• Headaches are common but can have many different causes
• There are both medication and non-medication ways to help

MEDICATION OPTIONS
• Over-the-counter pain relievers can help, including:
  - Ibuprofen
  - Paracetamol
  - These can be safely combined if needed (following proper dosing)
• Always follow package instructions carefully! 📦

WHEN TO SEE A DOCTOR
Please seek medical help if you experience:
• Severe or unusual headache pain
• Headaches that don't improve with over-the-counter medicine
• More frequent headaches than usual
• Any other worrying symptoms

SELF-CARE TIPS
While waiting for medicine to work, try:
• Resting in a quiet, dark room
• Staying hydrated
• Avoiding bright screens
• Using a cool compress

IMPORTANT REMINDER! 🌟
• This information is meant to help but isn't a replacement for proper medical care
• Every person is different, so what works best can vary
• If you're worried about your headache, please don't hesitate to see a healthcare provider
• They can give you personalized advice and make sure everything is okay! 

I care about your well-being! If your headache persists or worries you, please check with a healthcare professional for proper evaluation. They can determine the exact cause and best treatment for your specific situation. 🏥✨

Sources for more information:
https://example.com/mock

Take care and feel better soon! 
~PharmaMiku 💕
